channel.title: Comments on: Prem asks, “How can I recover files from a corrupt USB drive?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Kordell Stewart
item.dc:creator: Kordell Stewart
item.description: One thing I want to know to know about your utility Check Disk that whether it provide Save Recovery Session option to avoid re-scanning USB drive. I am familiar with utility Remo Recover, they provides Save Recovery Session option to avoid re-scanning USB
item.content:encoded: One thing I want to know to know about your utility Check Disk that whether it provide Save Recovery Session option to avoid re-scanning USB drive. I am familiar with utility Remo Recover, they provides Save Recovery Session option to avoid re-scanning USB
